title: ICE "Cannot copy into already initialized unsized place"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
`rustc ./src/test/ui/trivial-bounds/trivial-bounds-inconsistent-associated-functions.rs  --emit mir`
code:
````rust
// run-pass
// Inconsistent bounds with trait implementations

#![feature(trivial_bounds)]
#![allow(unused)]

trait A {
    fn foo(&self) -> Self where Self: Copy;
}

impl A for str {
    fn foo(&self) -> Self where Self: Copy { *"" }
}

impl A for i32 {
    fn foo(&self) -> Self { 3 }
}
````
